headline: Qatar Airways taps RTX's Collins Aerospace to optimize 787 fleet health and maintenance
summary: Collins Aerospace, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has been selected by Qatar Airways to provide its Ascentia™ analytics solution to its fleet of 52 Boeing 787 aircraft. Announced at the Dubai Air Show, Ascentia services will transform how Qatar Airways manages fleet maintenance by improving reliability, reducing costs and providing smoother travel experiences for passengers.

headline: RTX (RTX): Analyzing Valuation After Strong Share Price Momentum and Fresh Backlog Growth
summary: RTX (RTX) shares have moved modestly over the past week, up slightly as investors consider recent company fundamentals. The stock’s rise of 11% in the past month hints at renewed optimism about its outlook. See our latest analysis for RTX. RTX’s share price momentum has clearly picked up, with an impressive 11% gain over the past month and a year-to-date share price return of 51%. This surge highlights growing optimism, especially when viewed alongside its robust 1-year total shareholder...
